notFound.title: Lost your way?
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist, moved, or the URL has a typo. Let's get you back on track.
notFound.hint: Check the URL for typos, or use the navigation.

errorBoundary.title: Something went off course
errorBoundary.description: Our passport pigeons are on the case. Try refreshing, or head back home while we realign the navigation.
